question: Who was recently conferred with the prestigious ICSI Lifetime Achievement Award for 2020 by the Institute of Company Secretaries of India?
explanation:
The Chairperson of Bennett Coleman & Company Limited (BCCL), Indu Jain was conferred with the prestigious ICSI Lifetime Achievement Award by the Institute of Company Secretaries of India. Indu Jain was presented the award for her significant contribution towards translating corporate governance into reality.
The award ceremony was graced by Union Minister of state for Finance and Forporate affairs Anurag Singh Thakur and former Chief Justice of India Dipak Misra as the guests of honour. The awards are presented every year to recognize the contribution towards promoting good governance.
